message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive introductory price of $99. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a high-quality item at a great value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can we meet in the middle at $90?
I understand your interest in the product, Bob. How about we try to find a fair compromise? I'd like to offer you the product for $95. This is my best offer, considering the value it holds for us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $95. How about we meet in the middle at $92.50? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
